amendment.description: Amendment directs the GAO to conduct a study on the economic benefits of domestic oil and gas production as result of hydraulic fracturing including job creation, energy prices and State and Federal revenues.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 113-271 to direct the GAO to conduct a study on the economic benefits of domestic oil and gas production as result of hydraulic fracturing including job creation, energy prices and State and Federal revenues.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A004) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Reed amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Reed.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A004) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
